    • sameAsDomain

      public Boolean sameAsDomain() throws MalformedURLException
      Determines if a given URL has the same domain name as any of the base URLs
      Parameters:
      inURL - a url to compare to the list of base url's
      Returns:
      Boolean true if the given URL shares a domain name with one of the base URLs
      Throws:
      MalformedURLException
